DBGrid.grid-table: message_ower megor LEFT JOIN message meg ON (megor.message_id = meg.id) LEFT JOIN s_code sde ON (sde.code = megor.receive_state)
DBGrid.grid-orderBy: CASE megor.receive_state WHEN 'UNREAD' THEN 'READ' END,meg.send_date desc

DBGrid.grid-table: ORG o1 LEFT JOIN ORG o2 ON (o2.INNER_CODE = o1.PARENT_CODE)
DBGrid.grid-cols: o1.ID oId, o1.NAME oname, o2.NAME sname
DBGrid.grid-label: ID$h,单位名称,上级管理单位
DBGrid.grid-relation: o1.INNER_CODE LIKE '12%' and (o1.name like '%' || @param || '%' or o1.spell_first like '%' || @param || '%' or o1.spell_all like '%' || @param || '%')
